mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (nickname, password, username, profile_image, phone_number) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{password}, #{username}, #{profileImage}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT users.id, users.nickname, users.password, users.username, users.profile_image, users.phone_number FROM users WHERE users.username = #{username} AND users.deleted_time is null LIMIT 1
SELECT users.id, users.nickname, users.password, users.username, users.profile_image, users.phone_number FROM users WHERE users.phone_number = #{phoneNumber} AND users.deleted_time is null LIMIT 1
SELECT users.id, users.nickname, users.password, users.username, users.profile_image, users.phone_number FROM users WHERE users.id = #{id} AND users.deleted_time is null LIMIT 1
